fullplot: In 1980s Romania, thousands of Western films smashed through the Iron Curtain opening a window into the free world for those who dared to look. A black market VHS racketeer and a courageous female translator brought the magic of film to the masses and sowed the seeds of a revolution.
plot: A documentary about the magic of film and the power it has to change lives.
title: Chuck Norris vs Communism
